title: IFeatureManager.SolidForTrim
description: Gets or sets whether a surface trim feature is a solid body or a surface body.
returns: True if a solid body, false if a surface body (see Remarks )
remarks:
This property is only available when creating a surface trim feature. Call this property:
after calling
IFeatureManager::PreTrimSurface
before calling
IFeatureManager::PostTrimSurface
.
